examples: He contended that Communism had no future

definitions.text: to make the subject of dispute, contention, or litigation
examples: They contested the outcome of the race
We got by on just a gallon of gas
They made do on half a loaf of bread every day

definitions.text: compete for something; engage in a contest; measure oneself against others
be engaged in a fight; carry on a fight
examples: Militant groups are contending for control of the country
